reviewText: By looking at the cover, I was expecting something with a little more steam.  Beautiful leading actress, but not enough chemistry and emotion between the two leading characters.  The plot was slow and predictable.  The movie falls in the category of a boring day time soap opera.
Great movie with a few twists and turns. John Lloyd and Bea are a power couple. Thanks Amazon for providing this movie on prime. We need more like it.
Delivered on time I love the movie. The actor and the actresses are awesome. It's sad movie.
Good
The best part was the ending. It left viewers wondering what could have happened.  Each viewer will have their on conclusion.  Not a typical Filipino love story ending.
Great Movie
Great movie!
My wife loved the movie, but she wants more available...
If I cry, laugh, smile watching movie it means its a good one.  The ending makes me want part 2 of the movie :).
This movie was not in English and I just could not get into the subtitles. After 30 min, I just gave up on it.
So amazingly touching I can't stop crying.

THE RELATIONSHIP OF THE MISTRESS WITH THE MARRIED HUSBAND WAS GIVEN A PATRONIZING POSITIVE TWIST AND MORAL RATIONALIZATIONS IN THIS MOVIE, BUT STILL, IT IS BIBLICALLY WRONG AND REPREHENSIBLE TO MESS WITH THE EMOTIONS OF THE RELATIVES AND FAMILY MEMBERS OF SOMEONE WHO IS ALREADY MARRIED.  THE MISTRESS IS STILL AN EVIL WOMAN, NO MATTER, HOW SAINTLY SHE IS DEPICTED IN MOVIES, LIKE THIS.

To me the purpose of a movie is to entertain.  Did it entertain me?  Yes it did.  I wasn't only entertained but I was also drawn in by the characters.  I am Filipino and don't really care much about Tagalog movies, but this is an exception.  John Lloyd and Bea Alonzo's acting were a surprise to me, I didn't know they were that good.  And whoever translated the subtitles, they were spot on.
Touchy
Nice
Touching movie. There can be no happy ending.
15 minutes to long.
Plot is not believable
Very interesting to learn Philipino's culture!
very good sentimental movie
The movie was a little long, and starts slow, but it turns out to be a really good movie. I did NOT like the ending. I will not spoil it for you.

Sappy, shallow, predictable story. It plays like a cheesy TV drama, complete with swelling dramatic music. Ew. I guess very young women and teenaged girls will like it.  The female lead is very lovely and fun to watch - her acting is over the top but I think that's the cultural norm. The male lead is soft and pudgy and I had trouble seeing him as attractive as her lover or taking him all that seriously. Again, maybe cultural norms are in the way... perhaps a little soft and overweight is sexy in other cultures.
The difference between grateful companionship and true love
Not that great
No happy ending!
I have watched this movie when it was first shown and really enjoyed everytime!!!
Nice story
Great movie hope to have more filipino movies

Another Amazon shill film--a joke this is listed at 4 1/2 stars.  Hardly 3 star, its a poorly acted B movie, a drawn out soap opera melodrama that only delivers sappy sentiment.  This must sell in the Pacific.
A very sweet little movie
Great story

I watch Filipino movies to maintain my language skills.  The only "good" part in this movie is the beautiful leading lady.  This movie must have been written by some teenager during their lunch break.  The dialogue is less than poor, it is sprinkled with Taglish (Tagalog and English mixed together).  Taglish is what TexMex is to Spanish, it sounds pretentious.  The leading lady is a beautiful woman with great hair, every scene with her in it looks like a shampoo commercial.  The rest of the cast needs to return to acting school. I've seen high school drama club performers have more expression in their eyes that make you see and believe the character.
Loved it! You'll smile, laugh, cry and do it all over again. Roller-coaster of emotions. Great writing. Subtitles weren't so bad.
My god, all I did was cry for two hours but I cannot seem to give this film anything less than 5 stars.

This movie held my attention right to the very end. It takes a very good movie to do that, so many movies I start watching only to stop mid way because I lose interest. Definitely not the case with this one, I can truly relate with Sari, torn between two lovers. This movie had me laughing and crying, I have to keep this is my library so I can watch it over and over again!!
Touching, heartbreaking, excellent.
It is a fairly descent movie. It was a little twisted with the plots, but I like it.
Kindly add some more Filipino movies.
Great movie
Great story
nothing to say....
It was ok
The story line lacked substance.  It felt like a junior high romance movie.
This movie tore my heart apart more than many other great romantic movies. Maybe it is the context from which one watches it, but as for me, I was deeply moved.
Very good
It was a good chic flick..but dragged a bit...to much crying and indecision...hated the ending

The best movies, are those that can make you smile, laugh and cry. Those that keep you intrigued until it ends.  this is one of those movies, although some of it is predictable, it keeps your attention all the way through.
Suspenseful story of a heated love triangle that I would recommend to all.

l have watched only a few subtitled films because it's difficult to watch and read at the same time.  This movie was nice because half of the time they were talking in English and I was able to really watch the movie.  This movie brings out into view of true life scenario in any culture where an older man with money is able to get a young mistress and imprison her in the sense that it makes it difficult for her to fall in love with a younger man her age.  You must watch this film to see if the young mistress is able to break free from the older man!

Enjoyable movie but realistic story that will not win "feel good movie of the year." Hard to cast any stones here. You really feel for the leads here and especially the female lead who is in a tight spot. .

The leads are superbly acted/directed and the female lead is perfectly cast. Why did the male lead ditch his Porsche for a POS Nissan Titan pick-up that even Consumer Reports hates? Junk!

The female "friends" who work at the tailor shop where the female lead works are conniving b**ches who need ropes around their necks. FAST. I smell jealousy and conspiracy!

Ending is a wee bit murky and ambiguous for me but rewind and watch the last 10 minutes again.

You really feel for the leads by the end. Both are in difficult positions. Damn...

If you like Romance you will Love this movie!
Lots of twist but the actors show love in there eyes!
Very good!
Loved this movie.s  Well worth watching.
nan
A beautiful love story with a few twists of reality.  If your looking for boy meets girl- boy gets girl, this may not be for you.
Well done Love Story

This movie was an absolute delight. For the true romantic! From the characters' vulnerability and honesty to the twisted storyline, the acting... They sucked me in! I truly enjoyed the journey it took me on, and I shed a few happy tears with lots of heartwarming moments and heartbreak tears throughout. Watch it!  :-)  Watching him court, pursue and fall in love with her... Totally gave me Life. What almost every girl wants.~

Makes you wonder... "What would you do in this same situation?" Mentally & Emotionally Intense at times, while Complicated & Complex. Made my heart beat a little faster and harder. Lol.
The girl is way over his league

Having an affair with a married man is not morally right and nobody likes being cheated on.
This is a good movie though.
Great movie, not the ending I was looking for but wow.
Really good movie.

Whats the purpose of a movie? To entertain? If you laugh you cry on the edge of your seat, is that the key to a good movie. Then in that aspect this was a good movie. But for me, I want a happy ending. I don't want a crappy ending because that is why I watch movies in the first place to lose oneself in the theatrical. The ending was too close to a crappy Reality.
Very good movie. There were twist and turns, up and downs and kept my interest the whole time. I didn't find it too long as a result.
